subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki scored 43 points last night, including three free throws in the final five seconds of overtime, to lift the Dallas Mavericks to a 115-113 road victory against the Indiana Pacers.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki scored 43 points last night, including three free throws in the final five seconds of overtime, to lift the Dallas Mavericks to a 115-113 road victory against the Indiana Pacers.
